RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduação em Engenharia da Computação pela Universidade Braz Cubas (2001) e mestrado em Engenharia Elétrica pela Universidade Presbiteriana Mackenzie (2009). Tem experiência na área de ciência da computação, com ênfase em linguagem formais e autômatos, atuando nos seguintes temas: objetos de aprendizagem, projeto assistido por computador, interatividade e vídeo games, computação evolutiva, inteligência de enxame, redes neurais e aprendizagem de máquina, sistemas imunológicos artificiais, vida artificial, inteligência artificial, sistemas complexos, ciências dos dados, banco de dados, WEB, sistemas corporativos & consultoria, linguagens de programação e compiladores. Ensino de programação para engenharias e pós-graduação.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: He holds a degree in Computer Engineering from Universidade Braz Cubas (2001) and a Master's in Electrical Engineering from Universidade Presbiteriana Mackenzie (2009). He has experience in the area of computer science, with emphasis on formal languages and automata, working on the following topics: learning objects, computer-aided design, interactivity and video games, evolutionary computing, swarm intelligence, neural networks and machine learning, artificial immune systems, artificial life, artificial intelligence, complex systems, data sciences, databases, WEB, enterprise systems & consulting, programming languages and compilers. Programming teaching for engineering and graduate students.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
Forest Watch research project aims to collect images and sound data from Brazilian forests with remote sensing technology, Amazon and Mata Atlântica, to analyze and monitor biodiversity, risks, and threads such as fire, shots, and illegal activities such as logging, and poaching.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
https://www.wolfram.com/events/technology-conference/2022/

From small to big companies, operations work on top of traditional relational databases (RDBMS) and SQL is a lingua franca in business. To keep track of complex activities with vast amounts of transactions, lots of data is produced with ERPs, CRMs, BI, financial systems, RH, sales and internally built custom enterprise systems too. We can explore this information better to find patterns and insights for companies. The Wolfram Language can be used to import, process and combine all this info and relate it to real-world curated data. This data science hype brings P&D to many companies that can add value to the business and avoid risks.
